name: BURROWS a paradise beyond
description:
"If I'd known fate would catch up with me at my most vulnerable moment, I'd have gone back. Done things differently."

BURROWS a paradise beyond is a special one-shot Visual Novel that was made to celebrate BURROWS' first anniversary!

Experience a new story, featuring some of your favorite BURROWS characters!

This Visual novel features:

  • Nearly 20,000 words of content
  • Five fully sprited characters, each with multiple sets of expressions
  • More than Fifteen CG images, some of which are animated
  • A complete custom soundtrack with multiple artists
  • Several unlockable scenes, as well as a full secret ending!
  • More BURROWS content for you to enjoy!

Before reading this VN, I strongly suggest you read the source material, which you can find by clicking here!

BURROWS a paradise beyond is currently available for PC, Linux, and Mac. There are no plans for an Android build at the moment, as it would require an entire new UI. Sorry about that!
